subject: Fix NaN display in holdings and document Unum funds
body:
- Fix "R NaN" in Your Holdings by adding defensive checks in totalHoldingsValueZAR
- Add validation in Unum service for price parsing (getLatestPrice, getPricingHistory)
- Document all 6 Unum funds and DLS code mappings in DISCOVERY_ANALYSIS.md
- Note that KZAR is a custom Fireblocks token, not a Unum fund

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Fix NaN display in holdings and document Unum funds
